00128 inline void
00129 StreetSegmentItemReplyPacket::addMapID(uint32 mapID)
00130 {
00131    uint32 nbrMaps = getNbrMapIDs();
00132    int position = REPLY_HEADER_SIZE + 40 + 4 * nbrMaps;
00133    incWriteLong(position, mapID);
00134    setLength(position);
00135    writeLong(REPLY_HEADER_SIZE + 36, getNbrMapIDs()+1);
00136 }
00137 
00138 inline uint32 
00139 StreetSegmentItemReplyPacket::getNbrMapIDs() const
00140 {
00141    return readLong(REPLY_HEADER_SIZE + 36);   
00142 }
00143 
00144 inline uint32 
00145 StreetSegmentItemReplyPacket::getMapID(uint32 i) const
00146 {
00147    if( (i+1) > getNbrMapIDs() ) {
00148       return MAX_UINT32;
00149    } else {
00150       int position = REPLY_HEADER_SIZE + 40 + 4 * i;
00151       return readLong(position);
00152    }
00153 }
